name: Cats Alone at Home
description: This is a classic tower defence game involving cats vs dogs with a very simple design which we will later improve to add a lot more detail. Currently in the alpha version we have one level with pre determined positions for towers which once clicked will use 60 gold coins to place a tower which shoots enemies. The enemies are dogs although it may be hard to tell in the alpha as we have not yet developed detailed sprites. The dogs follow a pre-set path to the other end and if they are not killed will lower the players HP. Try to survive the incoming waves of dogs and defend your home.
